description:
The final confrontation between Black☆Star and Mifune begins! As the warriors clash, Mifune reveals a startling connection to the young Meister’s past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bu ka Shura ka: Kessen, Mifune vs Black*Star?
Guerriero o demonio? La battaglia decisiva:Mifune vs. Black Star?
Voie du guerrier ou voie du sang ! Combat final entre Mifune et Black Star ?
Warrior or Slaughterer? Showdown: Mifune vs. Black*Star?
武か修羅か ~決戦, ミフネvsブラック☆スター?~
